channel.title: Compliance Validation on AWS System Manager
channel.description: Recent content in Compliance Validation on AWS System Manager

item.title: 6.1. Enable AWS Config & Add Rules
item.description: Enable AWS Config (us-east-1) Recording: Record all resources Delivery: create a default S3 bucket and service-linked role Add managed rules (RDS/Backup): rds-backup-enabled rds-instance-deletion-protection-enabled rds-instance-public-access-check rds-storage-encrypted rds-snapshots-public-prohibited

item.title: 6.2. Conformance Pack for RDS
item.description: AWS Config → Conformance packs → Deploy → Template: Operational Best Practices for Amazon RDS → Name: cp-rds-ws → Deploy.
